subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins, the first Briton to win the Tour de France, could not truly celebrate Sunday in Paris with the Olympic men's road race in England only six days away.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins, the first Briton to win the Tour de France, could not truly celebrate Sunday in Paris with the Olympic men's road race in England only six days away.
